pagecontent.name: Vicktor Teixeira
pagecontent.title: Web Developer
pagecontent.presentation:
Hello, my name is Vicktor Teixeira and I'm a Web Developer.
I recently earned my bachelor's degree in Computer Science, which has equipped me with a strong understanding of coding and software engineering.

I am passionate about User Interface/User Experience (UI/UX) Design, particularly with creative layouts, and I also enjoy Graphic Design.

If you're looking for me, you'll probably find me admiring beautiful designs.
Here you can see some of the skills I have acquired throughout my career. I am always looking to learn new technologies and improve my skills.
pagecontent.presentation2: If you have any questions or would like to know more about my skills, you can see more about me on the Contact page.

pagecontent.title: Featured Projects
pagecontent.presentation: Those are some of the projects I've been working on. They're simple but they show my skills and my passion for Web Development and UI/UX Design.
pagecontent.presentation2: I started my journey by learning the basics of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. These fundamental languages allowed me to create static web pages and understand the structure of the web.
pagecontent.presentation3: I also plan to explore front-end frameworks and libraries (Vue, Tailwind, React) and dive deeper into back-end development (Node.js, Python).

items.name: Boate Azul
items.description: A simple website for a fictional nightclub.

items.name: Theme UI
items.description: A website where the color scheme are defined by the predominant color of an image.

items.name: III Computer Science Week
items.description: A website for the III Computer Science Week of the Federal Institute of Maranhão, Campus Caxias.

items.name: RoundHost
items.description: A login page for a fictional hosting company.

pagecontent.title: Contact Me
pagecontent.presentation: If you have any questions or would like to know more about me, feel free to contact me.
